thread.title: NHS nurse said: 'I'm bored who can we get rid of next?'
thread.title_full: NHS nurse said: 'I'm bored who can we get rid of next?'

title: NHS nurse said: 'I'm bored who can we get rid of next?'
text: show ad Nurse who said: 'I'm bored who can we get rid of next?' Ward manager struck off for fake medical records Michelle McClintock, 50, was so keen to free up bed spaces at William Harvey Hospital in Ashford, Kent, that she falsified patients’ medical records Another nurse heard her saying: ‘They can just s*** in their own toilet at home' McClintock was accused of completing fake details on checklists to make it look as though elderly patients were ready to be sent home to care for themselves Published: 00:20 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 00:34 GMT, 22 February 2017 58 shares
